This game is a recursive, self-intersecting, infinite and finite, deadly and immortal, present and ethereal dungeon crawler. All four of us will take roles as explorers of the dungeon (there is no GM role), and we will explore the infinite dungeon one room at a time.
This is a one shot. The game will be run over Zoom, and will be recorded and shared with player permission.
TTatEotDiEFtDaWWNEFtD (I'm not typing out the whole thing again) is available on itch.io [[here]](https://riverhousegames.itch.io/the-treasure-at-the-end-of-this-dungeon-is-an-escape-from-this-dungeon-and-we-wi). No prior knowledge of the game is required and the rules will be taught at the start of play.
## ﻿Safety Tools
We will be using script change, x-card, lines and veils, and an open door policy. All of these tools will be explained at the start of the session. This game follows [The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
